attributes.additional_details:
Far too many people have been let down by the NHS mental health services,which results in talented, bright young people losing their lives due to lack of support.

NHS funding needs to be re-considered as the NHS is funding other things ( e.g. private cosmetic surgery mistakes) and because of this as a result the NHS is not able to provide excellent mental health services.

Therapy should be available to those with severe mental illnesses without being put in a waiting list.
